Interface LegacySensorPort

All Superinterfaces:
AnalogPort, BasicSensorPort, java.io.Closeable, IOPort, SensorConstants
public interface LegacySensorPort
extends AnalogPort

Abstraction for a port that supports legacy RCX sensors.

Author:
Lawrie Griffiths.
